description: This file defines a function for creating an order from a user's shopping cart, involving database transactions, creating order and order item records, and deleting cart items.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Model representing a customer's order, with fields for user, order ID, payment, and address details.

classes.name: OrderItem
classes.description: Model representing individual items within an order, linked to products and the parent order.

methods.name: Order create_order_from_cart(*, user, checkout_data: dict)
methods.description: Creates an Order from the current cart items of the user, then clears the cart.
